overview: Badass Madapaka is Rex Navarrete's second stand-up special. Filmed live in 2005 at the historic Wiltern LG Theater in Los Angeles, we get a glimpse into his life on the road as well as see footage from his tours in Manila, Honolulu and San Francisco.
tagline: America's in the heart, but Spain's in the brain.
title: Rex Navarrete: Badass Madapaka
